components.text: The Aera have invaded the Union of Dispossessed Settlers seeking to carve a path through human space to the coreward regions of the jump network.
You are Deucalion, a human raised by the Klkâ€™k on Ktah, who just got his ship repaired after an emergency landing on Cephid 17 caused by a Luddite attack that cost hist best friend Lauktk his life.
You find yourself in the bar on the orbital station above Cephid 17 talking with Jenek, a ship dealer.
[Jenek] Ahh, that's right. You're here about the jump drive!
So you're interested in the jump drive now?

items.text: That's not what I'm here about.

components.text:
Here you go. It's being installed as we speak.
Well, what are you waiting for? Go and give it a spin!
I see ... Let me give you a very special price.
Dammit. I knew there would be no business to be done on this day!
Thank you and good bye o/
